name: LEAVE
description:
OR Play LEAVE online!

LEAVE is a competitive, fast paced and slightly strategic local multiplayer game. Its focus is a strong atmospheric feeling, a meaningful backstory and an enduring multiplayer experience. So grab a friend or a stranger, or a bunch of them, and start to compete for the chance to decide who will leave a hostile world.

ILLUSTRATED BACKSTORY
Discover more and visit scenes of LEAVE through VR-illustrations

The Laboratory (360°)
Welcome to the laboratory were it all started. The scientists who built the portal were ordinary people. But who were they? What was about to happen to their beautiful home planet for them to work on a way to find a new home in a different galaxy?

The Mountain (360°)
Where are you? This strangely shaped world is threatening and beautiful. This landscape seems to be both natural and designed. Like a mountain and a machine. Can you imagine to be here all alone, stranded and desperate?

The Planet (360°)
A world full of dust and stone and an uncertain past. No sign of life but ancient remains of an old civilisation. Maybe the diary entry can give some answers.



GAME CONTROLS

Press "P" to skip intro or pause the game
Player One (move using "A,W,D" and attack by pressing "1")
Player Two (move using the arrow keys and attack by pressing ".")
